greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists the parts > 1 of the n-th zone of the shell model of partitions, with a(1) = 1.
comment: The n-th zone of the shell model of partitions is formed by the parts of row n followed by infinitely many parts of size 1 (see example and also A210943).
Row n lists the largest part and the parts > 1 of the n-th zone of the model.
link: Omar E. Pol, Illustration of the partitions and regions of n, for n = 1..12
xref: Column 1 is A141285. Row n has length A194548(n), n > 1.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Apr 18 2012
